channel.title: [667] Client: How to change firecape movement? [714]
channel.description:
Title says it all.
How would you change how fast a firecape flows it's lava i guess. I'm more of a server developer. >.<
EDIT:
Also are you able to change the position of the Dungeoneering max capes trail effects because mine is also slightly to the left.
